content: I am not sure how I feel about this — I feel in this era of capitalist ideals it is healthy, if not necessary to start focusing on how we can help others. Of course financially is only 1 area of this, and i agree that we have to help others help themselves if we really want to make a lasting change. I am sure bad experiences in trying to help others can really make this difficult! But any small act of kindness is better than nothing
